TopicTitle: Do you guys feel like this is what the fan patience deserved?

Articles.Content:
2 hours ago, Periple said:

But none of that was ever promised! 

Yeah know that, but to up the simulation this was logical improvements,  for me this should have been the new features and improvements, not new facial expressions, not the clouds, textures and so on (not that I don't like em), the accurate physics most of all.
